column5: Just wanted to drop a line ( pun intended ) to wish Mike the Pike a Happy Birthday - sure hope its a good one!    Don
Hey Mike!  Hope you have a great birthday!  See you in a few weeks...I'll buy you a beer.  Cliff
Old Fart yah !
Happy Birthday MTP  Cheers  Craig
Happy B-Day to ya Mike, hope your day was a great one !!
Have a good one Old man  back from quinte yet? your bones are aching I guess
happy birthday,hope it is a good one
I can smell the  birthday candles from here. Dontcha have fire regulations in St-Hubert?  Happy happy to ya.
Happy birthday !!!!!!  ya-ol-bugger......I hope you got lots of shinny new lures and fishing stuff for your b-day !!!!!!    ill have a birthday beer with ya in a few weeks bud
That's funny  . Happy Birthday Mike!
Mike I said it in the other thread... but I know now that yer getting old you need things repeated  Happy Birthday man!!  Gerritt.
Happy Birthday Mike!!!  ... now that you're getting older, you're s'posed to be catchin' more and bigger fish!!!
Happy B-day Mikey.
Hope ya had a great day mike!  Maureen
Happy Birthday Mike!!!!!!!!
Thanks alot guys and gals and yes I am feeling old my body feels the aches from riding over the punishing waves of Quinte yesterday  .
Happy birthday Mike!
Happy Birthday Mikey  Joey
Happy happy happy Birthday Mike!!  It has been a pleasure getting to know you on the board, looking forward to getting to meet you in a few weeks
....Classic Roy, had me laughing. Hope you had a great day Mike.
Better late than never  Happy Birthday to you! Happy Birthday to you! Happy Birthday dear Mike...................... Happy Birthday to you!  Hope you had an awesome day  Cheers Jen
Mike ; Congrats on a birthday! Happy Birthday!  Easton
